metadata.title: CVE-2022-3559 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Exim and classified as problematic. This issueaffects some unknown processing of the component Regex Handler. Themanipulation leads to use after free. The name of the patch is4e9ed49f8f12eb331b29bd5b6dc3693c520fddc2. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211073 was assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
